meanings.definition: A unit of weight equal to 100 kilograms.
meanings.sent1: Farmers measured the harvest in centners to determine the total weight.
meanings.sent2: The market sold potatoes in centners for the customers to buy.
meanings.sent3: The centners of apples were so heavy that they made the scale tip over!
meanings.sent4: Her love for baking was as heavy as a thousand centners of flour.
meanings.sent5: The centners of rice piled up in the warehouse, ready for distribution.

meanings.sent1: The farmers loaded the truck with centners of wheat to take to the mill.
meanings.sent2: In the storage room, there were shelves filled with centners of canned goods.
meanings.sent3: The kids played a game, pretending the centners of toys were treasure chests.
meanings.sent4: The laughter in the room weighed more than a thousand centners of joy.
meanings.sent5: The centners of books in the library seemed to stretch on endlessly.
